Package camzup.core

Class Color.MixHsba

  • java.lang.Object
    • camzup.core.Color.AbstrEasing
      • camzup.core.Color.MixHsba
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Utils.EasingFuncObject<Color>, Utils.QuadFunction<Color,​Color,​java.lang.Float,​Color,​Color>
    Enclosing class:
    Color
    public static class Color.MixHsba
extends Color.AbstrEasing
    Eases between colors by hue, saturation and brightness.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      MixHsba()
      The default constructor.
      MixHsba​(Color.HueEasing hueFunc, Utils.LerpUnclamped satFunc, Utils.LerpUnclamped briFunc)
      Creates a color HSBA mixing function with the given easing functions for hue, saturation and brightness.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MixHsba

        public MixHsba()
        The default constructor. Creates a mixer with nearest hue interpolation and linear interpolation for saturation and brightness.

      • MixHsba

        public MixHsba​(Color.HueEasing hueFunc,
               Utils.LerpUnclamped satFunc,
               Utils.LerpUnclamped briFunc)
        Creates a color HSBA mixing function with the given easing functions for hue, saturation and brightness.
        Parameters:
        hueFunc - the hue easing function
        satFunc - the saturation easing function
        briFunc - the brightness easing function
